title: Vaibhavam Flower Brooch - A Timeless Heritage Jewel
materials: Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds) with VS clarity
Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Classic flower motif, meticulously handcrafted with traditional South Indian filigree work ('Jali' work) surrounding the central ruby. Features a raised setting to highlight the cabochon ruby and antique style Polki diamonds. The overall design incorporates elements reminiscent of temple jewelry (devasthanam alankarana) in a wearable modern form. The Polki diamonds are strategically placed to maximize brilliance and create a unique antique charm.
occasions: Perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any outfit
especially for traditional South Indian events such as weddings
or family functions. Also suitable for formal events where a touch of cultural heritage is desired.
description: This exquisite brooch is a celebration of South Indian craftsmanship, featuring high-quality materials and intricate design details. The use of Polki diamonds lends an air of timeless elegance, while the ruby adds a touch of vibrancy and prosperity. It's a versatile piece that can be worn on a saree, blouse, or even a coat, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Possessing this brooch means owning a small piece of Telugu cultural heritage (Telugu samskruti).
